name: Feature Request
about: Suggest a feature or enhancement for the template
title: "[FEATURE] "
labels: enhancement
assignees: ""
---

## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem Statement

What problem would this feature solve? Why is it needed?

**Example:** "I want to add a blog section to my resume site, but currently there's no easy way to do this without..."

## Proposed Solution

How do you envision this feature working?

Include:

- User experience (how would someone use it?)
- Configuration (what would need to be added to `resume.config.ts`?)
- Example usage or code snippets

## Alternatives Considered

What other solutions or workarounds have you thought about?

## Use Case

Describe your specific use case for this feature.

**Example:** "As a technical writer, I want to showcase my blog posts alongside my resume..."

## Additional Context

- Would this be useful to others?
- Any examples from other resume templates?
- Mockups, screenshots, or links to inspiration

## Implementation Notes (Optional)

If you have ideas about implementation:

- Which files would need changes?
- Any technical considerations?
- Breaking changes?

## Checklist

- [ ] I have searched existing issues and feature requests
- [ ] This feature aligns with the template's goal of being a professional resume site
- [ ] I would be willing to contribute to implementing this feature
